homepage.title: Create books online, share with World
homepage.description: Bookora is your free online book creator. Write your stories, organize chapters, and bring your ideas to life.

features.title: Powerful Features for Every Writer
features.description: From organizing chapters to exporting books, Bookora gives you all the tools you need to write with ease and confidence.

items.title: Multiple Books
items.description: Create and manage as many books as you want.

items.title: Smart Chapters & Sections
items.description: Organize chapters, add sections, and reorder them easily.

items.title: Auto Save
items.description: Never lose your progress, everything saves automatically.

items.title: Multi-language & Dark Mode
items.description: Personalize your writing space for comfort and focus.

items.title: Export & Share
items.description: Download your book in PDF/Docx or share it with others easily.

reviews.title: Loved by thousands of people
reviews.description: Here are what some of our users have to say about BookOra.

items.name: Sophia
items.body: Bookora makes writing so easy. I created my first novel outline in just one day!

items.name: Ethan
items.body: I love how I can organize chapters and sections. It feels like a professional writing tool.

items.name: Olivia
items.body: Auto-save is a lifesaver. I never worry about losing my drafts anymore.

items.name: Liam
items.body: The dark mode is perfect for late-night writing. Bookora really thought of everything.

items.name: Ava
items.body: Exporting my book to PDF was so smooth. Now I can easily share my work with friends.

items.name: Noah
items.body: This is the tool I have been waiting for. Writing, organizing, and publishing all in one place.
